about_the_game:
The strange feeling of deja vu when you wake up in a creepy room is not very pleasant. But the longer you stay awake, the creepier this place becomes. You came to your senses in an abandoned biolab disguised as a school. You have to investigate all the mysteries of the missing detectives with the help of their diaries. But due to the large amount of toxins and radiation in the school, the character will increasingly suffer from hallucinations.

Story
Several detectives went missing after attempts to investigate. You are next. What awaits you inside will make you want only one thing - to escape. But the longer you stay in this place, the more creepy things you will discover, and the hope of getting out will fade, as will the desire to learn more.
.

Locations
  • 1 Underground - A secret place where detectives were based when investigating experiments on people. All hints for further play are hidden there
  • 1 building - the place in which you appear. He is guarded by the mutant F.E.L.I.K, who, although smaller, is intelligent. To escape from him, you need to disappear from his sight for a long time. Look for key cards of different colors and open cabinets in which you can find survival items, as well as items to open doors
  • 2 building - guarded by Ilyich. You should not go to this building if you do not have a camera. Despite the high speed of this ghost, you can eliminate it for a while if you take a photo, so the flash will eliminate it. This city also contains the items to open door 305, as well as the map key.

Survival Staffs
  • Camera - is entered only in the first building. carried in the hands. The main purpose of this item is the elimination of Ilyich. The delay between shots lasts 4 seconds, so make sure Illich is close enough to you, because if the flash doesn't hit him, you risk getting caught by him. Also, with the help of the flash, you can show hints on the pictures.
Prehistory
How would you feel if you woke up at night in a locked abandoned school? In addition to you, there are brodt mutants here, as well as the souls of the workers of this institution. Be extremely careful when walking around this building, any careless movement and you risk being noticed by mutants. Use the ladders in the back rooms to move between floors without being noticed. And if you hear an intensifying pumping sound - run.

Gameplay
.
Solve puzzles and riddles using the clues encrypted on the walls. The camera will help you blur the line between the real world and the other world, so everything that is not available in reality will be revealed by the camera flash.



F.E.L.I.K
A mutant that resulted from a long stay in office 305. He hunts only in Corps 1, has good hearing and sees perfectly in the dark, unlike you. Therefore, pay attention to the sound coming from her speaker, if it gets louder, it means she is close to you. The best way to escape from her is to hide in a locker. But if she sees how you cheated on her, then you risk being destroyed along with him.
.

Illich
This creature is located in the building 2. It is more dangerous than mutant F.E.L.I.K because it is a half-ghost, has a high speed of movement and scares the character that stops him for a moment. But having a camera with you, you can eliminate it, although not for long.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains physical violence. There are places with blood on the map

name: Escape From School : F.E.L.I.C

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 или AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Discover all the secrets of the secret biolaboratory, which at first glance looks like an ordinary abandoned school. But soon it will turn out that you are not alone in this place. A face-to-face encounter with mutants is inevitable, so the main thing is to survive.
